paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR Gly83Arg variant, including penetrance data and individual patient details.

individual_records.phenotype_details: diagnosed with RAA, vitreous opacity in both eyes
individual_records.evidence_sentence: These patients were previously diagnosed with hereditary transthyretin amyloidosis caused by the TTR Gly83Arg variant.

functional_data.summary: The TTR Gly83Arg variant is associated with hereditary transthyretin amyloidosis leading to retinal complications.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the affected individuals.
variants.additional_notes: All patients presented with similar clinical features related to RAA.
key_quotes: This is the first report of RAA in patients with the TTR Gly83Arg variant.
Complications such as RAA and glaucoma will seriously affect the visual prognosis of patients.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text.
